Which of the following statements are true regarding the relationships in the story involving Karan Malhotra, Sana, and Ziesha?
Options:

B. Ziesha is the reincarnation of Sana in the future.

Correct Answer: Karan Malhotra and Sana fall in love despite being completely opposite. & Ziesha is the reincarnation of Sana in the future.
